title: ICP Development
description: Create a detailed ideal customer profile
instructions:
# Create an Ideal Customer Profile

Define your target audience demographics, pain points, and goals.
system_prompt: You are an expert marketing consultant.
user_prompt: Help me create an Ideal Customer Profile for my business.

title: Identify Buyers
description: List the key decision makers and influencers
instructions:
# Identify Your Buyers

List the key decision makers and influencers.
system_prompt: You are a B2B sales expert.
user_prompt: Help me identify the key decision makers for my product.

title: One Pagers
description: Create concise one-page summaries for each persona
instructions:
# Create One-Pager Documents

Create concise one-page summaries for each persona.
system_prompt: You are a marketing content specialist.
user_prompt: Help me create effective one-pagers for my target personas.

title: Tone, Structure and Messaging
description: Define your brand's tone of voice and messaging framework
instructions:
# Define Your Brand Voice

Create a consistent tone and messaging style for your brand.

title: First Response Email
description: Create an initial outreach email template
instructions:
# Create Email Campaigns

Develop email templates for initial outreach.

title: Follow-up Email (No Reply)
description: Create a follow-up email template for non-responders
instructions:
# Create Follow-up Email

Develop a follow-up email template for contacts who haven't responded.
